channel.title: Timers
channel.description:
Can anyone help me with combat timers, I'm using delta (i know that delta is crappy combat) but when i attack something i hit when I'm getting hit. In other words i get attacked and while my guy is doing the blocking emote, hes hitting the npc.
[IMG]http://i363.photobucket.com/albums/oo71/dman10345/shitcombat.png[/img]
